data.title: How old is Usher?
data.meta_description: How old is Usher? Learn the birthday of Usher and the exact age in years, months and days, with additional information of the singer.
data.text: Usher is an American singer, actor, songwriter, and dancer, who reached the prominence with his albums and songs rising the first lines of American charts. He was born in 1978 in Texas and since he was 12, he took part in a large number of various musical and dancing competitions. He signed up with the recording company when he was 16, and his first album was released when Usher was 17 years old. His second album, My Way included a number of hits like "You Make Me Wanna", "Nice and Slow", and the title one, "My Way", which received very warm reception. The second solo album of the singer was sold in 8 million copies and brought Usher 2 Grammy awards. His further albums, Confessions, Here I Stand and Raymond vs Raymond put Usher in the status of one of the best selling musicians of the 21st century. Till now, he sold over 18 million singles, received 8 Grammy and 18 Billboard Music Awards, collaborated with a large number of DJs and musicians like Robert Kelly, Rico Love, Martin Garrix, and others. Usher always mentions Michael Jackson as his idol and the most considerable influence. Usher is considered to be one of the most creative and prolific R&B musicians of all times.
